articles.description: Assertions of Tamil Nadu's autonomy & identity are at play in ongoing 44th Chess Olympiad, with DMK-led state govt continuing its discourse on federalism, say political observers.

articles.title: Daniel Ricciardo deserves better than being pawn in McLaren's pursuit of Oscar Piastri - ESPN India
articles.description: McLaren appears to be trying to force Daniel Ricciardo out for Oscar Piastri, but it is far from certain the Formula 2 champion would be an upgrade on his Australian counterpart.
